title: Best of The Herd: 08/28/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/28/2018
description:
Colin defends Tom Brady hanging up during a radio interview saying he has every right to be upset considering the lack of help he gets compared to other teams. He thinks ESPN has become a basketball network after they put out a ridiculous top 100 NFL players list. Plus, FOX College Football Analyst Joel Klatt comes in studio to argue with Colin about the opening week of the season. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
